name: Crimes of the Sinner
description:
Crimes of the Sinner is a visual novel made with visual novel maker. All the characters that are portrayed are 18+.

Crimes of the Sinner focuses on Caden, a man raised in prison who finally got out. He attends a private school where he meets new friends and old foes, and even saucy love interests. But things take a turn for the worst when a student is killed on school grounds. Now Caden must find out who is trying to frame him for murder in this non-stop heart pounding psychological horror dating sim story.

Note: This game is Rated T for Teen. It contains language, sexual content, mild violence, frightening content, a scene of implied suicide and crude humor. Recommended Player Age: 15+

Note: DLC Will be released soon and this game is in early access.
